Sentencas: A three-dimensional multi-cell model based on a prototypical, planar solid oxide fuel cell (pSOFC) stack design using compliant mica-based seal gaskets was constructed in this study to perform comprehensive thermal stress analyses by using a commercial finite element analysis (FEA) code.
Titulo: Thermal stress analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Effects of sealing design

Sentencas: Effects of the applied assembly load on the thermal stress distribution in the given integrated pSOFC stack with such a compressive sealing design were characterized.
Titulo: Thermal stress analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Effects of sealing design

Sentencas: A comparison was made with a previous study for a similar comprehensive multi-cell pSOFC stack model but using only a rigid type of glass-ceramic sealant instead.
Titulo: Thermal stress analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Effects of sealing design

Sentencas: Simulation results indicate that stress distributions in the components such as positive electrode-electrolyte-negative electrode (PEN) plate, PEN-supporting window frame, nickel mesh, and interconnect were mainly governed by the thermal expansion mismatch rather than by the applied compressive load.
Titulo: Thermal stress analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Effects of sealing design

Sentencas: An applied compressive load of 0.6 MPa could eliminate the bending deformation in the PEN-frame assembly plate leading to a well joined structure.
Titulo: Thermal stress analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Effects of sealing design

Sentencas: For a greater applied load, the critical stresses in the glass-ceramic and mica sealants were increased to a potential failure level.
Titulo: Thermal stress analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Effects of sealing design

Sentencas: In this regard, a 0.6 MPa compressive load was considered an optimal assembly load.
Titulo: Thermal stress analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Effects of sealing design

Sentencas: Changing the seal between the connecting metallic PEN-supporting frame and interconnect from a rigid type of glass-ceramic sealant to a compressive type of mica gasket would significantly influence the thermal stress distribution in the PEN plate.
Titulo: Thermal stress analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Effects of sealing design

Sentencas: The critical stress in the PEN was favorably decreased at room temperature but considerably increased at operating temperature due to such a change in sealing design.
Titulo: Thermal stress analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Effects of sealing design

Sentencas: Such differences in the stress distribution could be ascribed to the differences in the constrained conditions at the interfaces of adjacent components under various sealing designs.
Titulo: Thermal stress analysis of planar solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Effects of sealing design
